designation: Full Stack Developer, ML Ops Engineer
intro:
Being a passionate Software Developer, I love to explore new technology with a zeal of creating something awesome.

The journey has always been more important to me than the end. I love the dedication, commitment and perseverance that is required to build a software.

In my free time, I like to read, sketch and do some urban gardening.
experienceSummary: Having five years of expertise working in various roles in software development, I have honed my skills in coding, debugging, and optimizing applications, as well as gained significant experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
projectsSummary: Here are some of the individual projects I worked on during my master's program. Despite the limited timeframe, they hold a special place in my heart.

skills.heading: Skills
skills.summary: I believe Problem-solving is a crucial skill in software development. Being open to learning new technologies as required by business demands is essential.

leftSection.heading: What I bring to the table?
leftSection.summary: I thrive in high-intensity teams, where I can contribute and deliver results that directly impact business productivity metrics.

otherSkills.heading: I love to learn
otherSkills.subheading: Here are the technologies I have worked with so far, and I am eager to discover the insights and knowledge that my upcoming projects will offer

workexperience.Responsibilities:
Building data science applications using sensor data and providing solutions for critical mining fleet management under the Load and Haul Team involves leveraging advanced analytics to optimize operations and enhance safety.
This includes developing predictive models to minimize downtime, implementing real-time monitoring systems for improved efficiency, and integrating machine learning algorithms for managing load and haul processes in mining.
By harnessing sensor data from mining equipment, we can enhance productivity, reduce operational costs, and ensure compliance with safety regulations, thereby transforming mining fleet management into a streamlined and data-driven process.
CMS development for various marketing websites. Understanding business requirements and create engaging UI/UX for Insurance Products. Creating visualizations and charts to show realtime quotes.

Creating Jenkins pipelines for deployment and development environment for several Machine Learning projects.

Worked in Solutions Acceleration and Innovation team, creating automation scripts for smooth deployment from dev to prod builds.
workexperience.Skills: Python, Jupyter Notebook, Machine Learning, Jenkins, Github Management

workexperience.Responsibilities:
Researching and Developing blockchain based platform for issuance / verification of documents digitally.

Developing Web Platform for Trading in various stock exchanges.
workexperience.Skills: Python, JavaScript, Typescript, Angular, HTML5, JQuery, CSS

workexperience.Responsibilities:
Developing an Order Management System for Openreach to provide Broadband and Telephony services.

Creating Low Level Designs and Test Plans to cater to cutting edge demands of the users.

Working along-side of designers to understand the Solution Design and develop code catering to all the requirements.
